member.name: M:IkeMtz.NRSRx.Logging.Splunk.SplunkExtensions.ConfigureSplunkLogger(Microsoft.Extensions.Configuration.IConfiguration,System.Func{Serilog.Configuration.LoggerMinimumLevelConfiguration,Serilog.LoggerConfiguration})
member.summary: Configures the logger to log to a Splunk instance.
member.param: Callback to configure the minimum log level (default: Information).
member.remarks:
The following configuration variables are required: - SPLUNK_HOST: The URL of the Splunk HTTP Event Collector (HEC) endpoint. - SPLUNK_TOKEN: The authentication token for the Splunk HEC.
The following configuration values are optional: - SPLUNK_DISABLE_SSL_VALIDATION: Set to "true" to disable SSL validation (default: false). - SPLUNK_URI_PATH: The URI path for the Splunk HEC (default: "services/collector/event"). - SPLUNK_INDEX: The index to send events to (default: empty). - SPLUNK_SOURCE_TYPE: The source type for the events (default: empty). - ENVIRONMENT_NAME: The environment name to include in the logs (default: empty).
